heading: HB05240
0: AN ACT PROTECTING THE REMITTANCE OR MONEY TRANSFERS OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS (OFWs) BY REQUIRING THE DISCLOSURE OF FINANCE CHARGES AND OTHER FEES IN CONNECTION WITH MONEY TRANSFER, COMPELLING STRICT ADHERENCE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THEIR TRANSFER, PENALIZING VIOLATIONS THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES since 2019-11-06

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05240
